title: Interpretation of the presence of green plants in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Green plantings in a dream and the meaning of seeing them Among the scenes that radiate positive energy for the soul are green plantings and beautiful trees. Due to its different shapes and colors, in addition to the fact that green has a positive psychological impact on many, we will provide you with the most important interpretations that will benefit you when both of you see green plants in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about planting seedlingsSeeing him planting seedlings is a good vision and its interpretation gives peace, especially if he sees The student or teenage boy himself plants the seedlings in the ground, then waters them and takes care of them. Because he will be interested in his lessons and want to get the highest grades. As for the vision of planting seedlings in a mature man’s dream, this is evidence that he will obtain goodness and livelihood that will never cease, and if he is born female and wants to have a boy, then this vision promises him that he will give birth to a male child, The second interpretation is the pregnancy of the dreamer’s wife. When the dreamer sees that he is planting small seedlings in the ground and comes every day to take care of them and tell them until they grow in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will put effort into something, and this thing. Or this work will bear fruit and the dreamer will gain a lot of money and success from it, but this success will be in the long term and not in the short term, so this vision has a good interpretation, but he is convinced that the dreamer must be patient until he gets what he wants in this. The world. An unmarried woman plants seedlings in a dream in a beautiful flower shop full of different flowers, but her planting is still very small and has a long time to grow. Planting in a dream is lawful and good. Therefore, whoever sees a green and beautiful plant in a dream, this is evidence that he will achieve goodness and happiness. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he admires a beautiful plant in the garden, but it does not belong to him but to someone else, and the dreamer picks up the plant, takes it and leaves, then this is evidence that the dreamer will earn from what is forbidden and steal other people’s money. He knows the truth. He takes things that he did not really deserve, And it makes others sad about their stolen money. Green plants in a married woman’s dream When a married woman who has given birth to more than one child sees that she is watering and taking care of the plants in her house, this vision contains a message that these children should know their religion and memorize the Qur’an. Their mother must give them the correct foundations of religion, and teach them from an early age until their nails are given to them later. Ibn Sirin said that a married woman who sees in her dream that she has bulldozed land that does not belong to her, then this is evidence of the devastation and marital problems that will be her lot. If she is a woman A married woman plants wheat in her dream, then this is a sign of adversity and difficult circumstances that she will go through. For a married woman to see that her crops have burned in a dream is evidence of misfortunes that will surprise her, whether from the illness or death of her children, or her divorce from her husband or the loss of all his money. When a married woman sees That her farm had sunk. Due to heavy rain or heavy rain, this is evidence that children

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a spacious old house

preview.html: In the following lines, we will discuss and explain it from the Al-Mufassir website to interpret the dream of buying a large, used house, and the interpretation of the dream of buying a large, old house for a divorced woman, as well as the interpretation of the dream of buying a large house. A spacious house according to the social position of opinion. Interpretation of a dream about buying an old, spacious house in a dream for a single girl. When a girl dreams that she is buying an old, spacious house. This is an indication of her imminent marriage to a man of limited standing. A single girl seeing in her dream that she is buying an old house. She feels comfortable and reassured, This is a sign that her condition has changed for the better. A single woman seeing a spacious old house in a dream is a sign of the end of her fears and her superiority in her life. The vision may be a harbinger of good work that the girl will be involved in. At other times, it can be a sign of what she is suffering from. Girl. An unmarried woman can see a spacious old house, and this is an indication of her relationship with someone who does not deserve her. While if she sees that this house is her home, this is evidence that there are problems she is going through, but they will end. If a girl sees that she will return to her old house. This is a good omen for overcoming the problems you are facing, especially emotional ones. It may be a sign of her separation from her fiancé. If she has reached old age and is not married, this is an expression of her psychological state and the frustration she is suffering from. When she sees that you are buying a used house in a dream, this means That someone is proposing to marry her. See also: Interpretation of seeing entering or buying a new house in a dreamInterpretation of seeing buying an old, spacious house in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees that she is buying an old, spacious house, this indicates a problem she will face with her husband. It may be buying an old house Spacious in a married man’s dream. It is an indication that her husband will make a large profit from trade or business. If a married woman sees an old house in a dream, this is good news that her hopes will come true soon, God willing. A married woman seeing an old and spacious house is evidence that she feels distressed. In her life. This vision may be a sign of the stability of her married life. Seeing the old house in a married woman’s dream is a sign of a financial crisis that the woman is going through. Seeing the old house for a married woman may be an expression of her longing for her previous life. If she sees that her children live in a house Old and spacious. This may mean that she is attached to her children and is afraid of them. It is also evidence of her good relationship with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about buying an old and spacious house in a dream for a divorced woman. If the divorced woman sees that she is buying an old and spacious house. This is a sign of sadness over separation from her husband, and the spacious house is evidence of She does not hate him. Seeing the old house for a divorced woman can be a sign that she will return to her ex-husband. Seeing a divorced woman returning to the old house can be good news of the goodness to come, happiness and expected. If a divorced woman sees that the old house is more beautiful than the modern house, this indicates Although she is going through a health crisis. When she sees that they are demolishing the...

title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole candy in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you a complete interpretation of the pudding you saw in a dream. Pudding is a type of dessert known in many parts of the world. It is known to be made by adding milk with starch and sugar and then mixing it well until the pudding is made from sweets, nuts and fruits. Pudding in a dream is full of things that many people dream of, so we offer you, dear followers, all the advice about the meaning of the word pudding in a dream in full, as well as distributing sweets in a dream or cooking pudding in a complete dream as we have collected it for you Dear God, why do you dream of eating pudding for healthy women And married and pregnant women, as well as for men in the street books of major scholars who interpret dreams and visions. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s sweets in a dream Seeing whole sweets in a dream, as mentioned by the scholar Ibn Sirin, is a sign for the dreamer of happy days. Likewise, seeing a man in a dream promising milk and starch is good news. And evidence that he heard the good news. Why dream of eating sweets in a dream is complete evidence that God will live a life free of problems and diseases. He also indicated the presence of sweets in a dream filled with a sick person - which is one of the desired dreams, which indicates a speedy recovery. Seeing sweets in The dream means that the dreamer will have a lot of food and money in his life. The interpretation of seeing spoiled pudding in a dream indicates failure and inability to achieve what you want, and it is also a sign of anxiety and annoyance. Eating fresh and delicious pudding in a dream that is full of it is a sign of joys and pleasures. Which awaits the dreamer.Seeing sweets in a dream full of public womenWhy do elderly women dream of eating sweets is good news if they are beautiful and have a wonderful taste.Candy in Ibn Sirin’s dream in a woman’s bowl is one of the praiseworthy visions of preparing the one she loves and proving her marriage.The only girl distributing sweets in a dream Kamel testifies to the successes and successes in her life and the fulfillment of desires and goals. What is the interpretation of seeing pudding for the people of Ibn Sirin? He said: If they cook it and eat it greedily, this indicates good and happy days. Why dream of eating sweets for a married woman? The interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a married woman is complete from the visions that It testifies to her good stability and the best ups and downs in her life. Seeing a woman eating sweets in a dream means that in the coming days she will receive many benefits and benefits. Coming out of a woman’s vagina or completely understanding in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate that she will soon become pregnant. Cooking sweets In a dream, the interpretation of a dream about preparing pudding or preparing it and distributing it to his family is evidence of family ties and happiness for that person and his family. Seeing a complete preparation of pudding in a dream, and it was bad, indicates that some serious and difficult things will happen that will harm the dreamer. But dreaming about cooking pudding and adding nuts or Full fruits in a dream are considered one of the generally praiseworthy and desirable visions. Distributing sweets in a dream in full. Interpretation of distributing sweets.

title: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a woman married to her husband

preview.html: These dreams often contain a lot of goodness and we look at the interpretation of the dream of marriage for a woman married to her husband.Interpretation of the dream of marriage for a married woman, interpretation of dreams and visionsThe dream of the marriage of a woman being re-crowned by her husband shows some of the following interpretations and signals: Seeing a woman marrying her husband again shows her intense love For this husband. It signifies happiness, love and a stable married life. Seeing a married woman indicates that she has remarried her husband in a dream, which indicates that pregnancy and childbirth will be soon. Seeing a married woman in her dream means that she will marry her husband again to renew life between them. And their appetite for abundant profit and a lot of money in the future. A married woman who dreams of marrying again to her husband and giving birth to a child from him indicates the approaching marriage of her son, if he is old. Seeing a married woman in a dream marrying someone other than her husband is evidence of stability. Her married life and the well-being of her children. Seeing a woman married to someone other than her husband also means that she will obtain a large profit and a good job in her professional life. Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a single woman - Interpretation of dreams and visions Among the dreams that a single woman sees in her dreams is the dream of marriage, which is most often a vision It benefits a single person. The dream of marriage for an unmarried woman is one of the dreams that indicate the goodness that will come to her and her imminent engagement or marriage if she gets engaged. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is marrying a tall man with a handsome face, this will be evidence to her that she will get a lot. Money is on the way. It may be an indication of her strong progress in professional life. Dreaming of an unmarried woman getting married and having a big wedding, with dancing and joy, shows her friends’ love for her. Remembering her reputation as a doctor among her acquaintances. What if the unmarried woman attended her sister’s wedding, and it Her dress is beautiful and white. It is an indication of the imminent date of her engagement to a reputable husband. Seeing an unmarried woman indicates that she will marry an ugly person. It will be evidence of problems in her professional life and they will be resolved if she gets married. We chose for you: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a woman in a dream and its meaningInterpretation The dream of marriage for a woman divorced from her husband, interpretation of dreams and visions. When you see a divorced woman marrying her ex-husband, this indicates the following: It indicates the vision of the divorced woman marrying her ex-husband, and this is evidence of a change in the circumstances of her family and family. It indicates the happy life that the divorced woman expects to be compensated for what She lost him after her divorce. The marriage of a divorced woman in a dream to her ex-husband indicates her urgent desire to return to him again and restore what was destroyed by divorce and separation between them and some. Also, seeing a divorced woman indicates her marriage to her ex-husband. Faraj and happiness to meet them anywhere again. Interpretation of the dream of a pregnant woman marrying her husband and interpretation of dreams and visions. As for the pregnant woman, her dream of marrying her husband indicates various connotations and interpretations, including: The pregnant woman’s dream of marrying her husband again is...

title: Interpretation of kissing or being kissed in a dream

preview.html: Kissing in a dream has many connotations and meanings. Some are symbolic and some feature the emotional side of the viewer. Kissing in a dream means acceptance and approval of someone who is chasing or persevering, or hoping for a need. The kiss has an emotional connotation in analytical psychology. In a dream, it is either the fulfillment of a sensual desire or compensation for emotional deprivation. The interpretation of a kiss varies according to its location and also according to the person who was kissed in the dream. Kissing the hand differs from kissing the cheek, forehead, and mouth, and kissing in a dream is preferable, provided that it is not with lust or desire. The meaning of kissing and kissing in a dream is the same. Whoever sees in a dream that he is kissing someone, then in waking life he receives something that is consistent with the interpretation of that person’s personality. It is praiseworthy in a dream for an unmarried woman to kiss her mother, father, sister, brother, aunt, or grandmother. Read also: Father in a dream The meaning of kissing in an unmarried woman’s dream is justice, kindness, and tenderness. However, if an unmarried woman sees that someone is kissing her, this means accepting an effort, request, desire, or hope, and it is more likely that the kiss indicates a journey or success. Read also: Success in a dreamAt other times, it shows marriage. Especially if a single woman sees someone she knows in appearance and character kissing her forehead, cheek or mouth. All of these manifestations in a dream can be interpreted in a good way, unless they are accompanied by something shameful or shameful. If the dreamer feels ashamed in the dream, there is no harm in the vision, and the kiss remains praiseworthy, and the dreamer can be optimistic about it with the utmost optimism. Read also: Shyness in Dream Meaning of kissing and kissing in a dream for a married woman: A husband kissing his wife in a dream is reconciliation, friendship and love. Also, a woman kissing her husband in a dream is a good thing. It is said that a husband kissing his wife can sometimes indicate pregnancy. Especially if the kiss was on the stomach. It has been said: The husband’s kiss is praised everywhere. But if a married woman sees in a dream that someone other than her husband is kissing her. They receive it from those who have accepted the benefit or interest. The best kiss in this regard is the kiss on the forehead, but if a married woman sees a man other than her husband kissing her hand, then she will gain her satisfaction. Read also: A handsome man in a dreamBut if a married woman sees that she is kissing someone she knows. He comes up with something good and that person benefits from it. It is praiseworthy in the interpretation that a married woman kisses her father, mother, and sisters. It is also praiseworthy to kiss a neighbor or neighbour, and it has been said: Kissing a neighbor in a dream means receiving good news. As well as kissing a friend and colleague. Provided that the position of the kiss is appropriate, that is, the kiss is on the head or the forehead. Read also: Neighbor in a dream The meaning of kissing and kissing in a dream for a pregnant womanKissing in a dream for a pregnant woman is comfort and salvation. Especially if the woman being kissed in the dream is her mother, grandmother, or one of her relatives. A husband's kiss in a dream is interpreted by a pregnant woman. He said a wish come true or please. The meaning of kissing in a dream has no cause

title: Ibn Sirin’s most important interpretations of seeing chickpeas in a dream

preview.html: Chickpeas in a dream, chickpeas are considered a legume rich in substances with high nutritional value and various health benefits. The interpretations of seeing it in a dream differ according to its types and colors. We will learn about the meanings of chickpeas in all its forms. Are they hot or cooked? What do lawyers think of a dream about yellow chickpeas? Is it different from green? We will discuss all of this in detail, so if you are interested in pursuing this vision, you can continue reading the article with us. Chickpeas in a dream Interpretations of seeing chickpeas in a dream carry many different meanings that can be positive and can become negative, depending on the type of chickpeas, such as: The interpretation of a dream about burnt chickpeas in a dream can indicate sadness, depression and anxiety. It is said that seeing chickpeas in a dream symbolizes the confusion of the dreamer's mind with random and useless thoughts. Hot chickpeas in a dream indicate the dreamer's desires and his indulgence in worldly pleasures. Some scholars continued to interpret eating chickpeas in a dream as evidence of the dreamer's fatigue to achieve his goal and his stumbling on the way to achieving it. Jurists indicated that seeing green chickpeas in a dream is better than dry because it contains a blessing and goodness for the dreamer. Eating green chickpeas in an unmarried woman's dream promises her happiness. Chickpeas in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing chickpeas in a dream may indicate that you are collecting money after misery and fatigue. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of hot chickpeas in a single dreamer's dream as a sign of a close relationship. Dry or dry chickpeas may predict In a divorced woman's dream, she will go through a difficult period during which she will suffer from problems and a lack of money. If a married man sees that he is eating fresh chickpeas and they taste delicious, this is good news for the good news that may be a promotion at work or his wife's pregnancy. Chickpeas in a dream for Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi agrees with other scholars that seeing chickpeas in a dream can indicate good and can warn against evil, as we see in his interpretations: Al-Nabulsi said: Whoever dreams that he is collecting chickpeas is a sign of an abundance of sustenance that comes and is admired. While harvesting chickpeas at a different time in the dreamer's dream, it may indicate that he is facing difficulties and the outbreak of disputes with others. If the dreamer sees that he is planting chickpeas on someone else's land, he violates the honor of others. Chickpeas in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees chickpeas in her dream, this is a sign of a happy occasion. Seeing a girl serving a plate of cooked chickpeas to guests in her house is a sign that she maintains kinship ties. Chickpeas in a dream for a married woman Eating yellow chickpeas in a married woman's dream can lead to delayed childbearing. Seeing the dreamer eating dry chickpeas in a dream may mean that she is facing problems in raising her children. title: Interpretation of aunt in a dream I saw my aunt in a dream

preview.html: The mother's brother Interpretation of a dream about an aunt Ibn Sirin Symbol of an aunt in a dream Seeing my aunt in a dream Interpretation of a dream about an aunt, the mother's sister Seeing a dead aunt in a dream Seeing an aunt in a dream about a pregnant woman Kissing an aunt in a dream Interpretation of seeing your cousin in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of an aunt in a dream The aunt in the language is the mother's sister and her sister, but in the interpretation of dreams it is not like that at all, it is in the interpretation of a woman, which means that her expression or interpretation is done in the same way as the woman is interpreted in a dream, but the aunt is mentioned in the Qur’an among the forbidden things, as God Almighty said in Surat An-Nisa, verse 23. {Forbidden to you are your mothers, your daughters, your sisters, your aunts, your maternal aunts, your brother's daughters, your sister's daughters, your mothers who nursed you, your nursing sisters, your mothers-in-law, and your sisters-aunts. You have custody of the women you have entered. Indeed, God is Forgiving and Merciful.} The description of the prohibition brought by this noble verse is important for interpreting the dream of an aunt, especially for men. As the aunt and the other woman mentioned symbolize the limits and prohibitions of religion. But this interpretation is misleading and narrow because it only relates to visions in which the dreamer sees himself marrying an incestuous person, and of course the dream is a warning against committing sins or evil or something like that. As for the aunt in a woman's dream, she is one of the visions that arouse optimism, especially if she appears in the dream veiled, religious, or wearing a beautiful dress or the like. An unmarried woman may see her aunt in a dream offering her a dress, ring, veil or dress. This vision can be interpreted as wanting the aunt to marry one of her children to the dreamer, or seeking to do so with determination and seriousness. An unmarried woman may see her aunt in a dream wearing new shoes, and this means that the world will fulfill this girl’s desire, such as travel, work, or even marriage. The aunt who appears in a married woman’s dream and serves her food, visits her in her house, drinks her, or sleeps in her bed, this means that she makes her living easier, and that wholesale news will knock on the woman’s door and she may be pregnant or announce a male child if she is pregnant. If a girl dreams of seeing her aunt or uncle, this means that she will receive a severe reprimand for some work, which will cause her severe depression. If this relative appears smiling and happy, a slight difference will soon give way to fun. Seeing an aunt in a dream is often undesirable. Seeing an aunt in a dream in a bad condition is evidence that the dreamer will receive a severe reprimand for doing something that will cause him problems and depression. If the aunt is smiling in the dream and in good condition, this indicates that there is a slight difference that will pave the way for fun and enjoyment soon. The presence of an aunt in a dream may indicate criticism that the dreamer may be exposed to in particular because of some behavior. Interpretation of a dead or deceased aunt in a dream. Since a living aunt may sometimes symbolize the world, a deceased aunt is a symbol of the afterlife, or rather of work that benefits the afterlife, such as charity, prayer, and

title: Treasure in a dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation for a single, married, and pregnant woman

preview.html: Hello and welcome to Interpretation of Dreams, the topic of today’s article is: Interpretation of seeing treasure or treasures in a dream, in which we adopt the opinion of Ibn Sirin and his interpretation of the expression of treasure in a dream. In addition, the article will address the following elements or visions: Interpretation of mining treasure buried underground And buried gold, and seeing Pharaonic antiquities, and in general antiquities in a dream, for singles, married people, pregnant women, and men as well. Interpretation of seeing treasures or treasures by Ibn Sirinkenz in visions and the world of dream interpretation indicates that a woman is pregnant, because gold in a dream is for boys and silver is for a maid. Treasure in a dream indicates abundance and abundance of money, and it is for knowledge, knowledge and gathering of the world. Treasure in a merchant or businessman’s dream is sustenance and profit. It was said: Treasures are a sign of martyrdom, and treasures are the deeds that the dreamer acquires or acquires after traveling. Whoever sees in his dream a treasure containing money, he will be affected by it in his waking life, or it indicates prestige or power. Treasure is victory or success. It was said that there is a book of healing. It is said that a woman saw her daughter dead and said to her, “My daughter, what deeds did you find to be good?” The girl replied: You eat walnuts, so give them to the poor. He told this dream to Ibn Sirin, and he said: This woman takes her treasure and believes it. The woman replied: May God forgive me, for I have a treasure that I have buried since the days of the plague. He saw a man three times in a row, as if a man had come to him and said to him: Go to Basra, for you have a treasure there, carry it. For days he did not see anything that the phone told him, so he gave up and blamed himself for all the responsibilities, then he entered an abandoned or dilapidated house. He searched through it until he found a notebook that he took out and then looked at it. He knew nothing about it, and it was written in Hebrew, and he could not find anyone in Basra to read or translate it, so he took it to a young man from the people of Baghdad. So he translated it for him and it was a valuable or valuable book in the arts of speech or expression. A treasure buried underground in a dream A treasure buried underground in a dream symbolizes the intellectual and cognitive energy of a person that he does not use, and it also expresses mental abilities and capabilities. Science and knowledge, as well as books and libraries, symbolizes the accumulation or saving of money, and sometimes it expresses the husband’s stinginess, and many times it expresses a happy event or news. Interpretation of a dream about digging for treasures or treasures in a dream: seeing your dream that you are pulling treasure from the ground has interpretations a lot. And if you are looking for a job, you will find the best jobs and earn a lot of money. And if you are a student of knowledge, you have achieved great success and victory. Extracting treasures of gold, silver, pearls, coral, gems or other precious metals or precious stones means in dream interpretation that you find a permanent source of livelihood or that God gives you a good child or that God gives you a desire to Your heart, whether it is wide-ranging or difficult to reach. Interpretation of seeing Pharaonic antiquities in a dream: Pharaonic antiquities in a dream that are made of pure gold are considered an expression of protection from envy or evil, because the land of the Pharaohs

Extracting treasures of gold, silver, pearls, coral, gems or other precious metals or precious stones means in dream interpretation that you find a permanent source of livelihood or that God gives you a good child or that God gives you a desire to Your heart, whether it is wide-ranging or difficult to reach.
